name: All's Fair In a Loving War
name_original: All's Fair In a Loving War
description:
Game Name:

All's Fair In A Loving War

Gameplay:

The game is of the tower defence style, requiring the balancing of income elements, tower statistics and placement to defeat the opponents. Can you make it past all ten waves to victory?

Synopsis:

In a war torn world, the only thing that stands in the way of a renewed conflict is the force of love. Utilise the power of love through the piercing nature of Love Letters, or fire cupids arrow from his recently upgraded bow (He moved up to a Ballista. Who can blame him? Love is tricky) to defeat the approaching army and show them that love can prevail even against the most hardened hearts. After all, all is fair in a loving war.
